texts.Volo.Account:InvalidEmailAddress: Can not find the given email address:{0}
texts.Volo.Account:ImpersonateTenantOnlyAvaila: Impersonate tenant only available for host!
texts.Volo.Account:ThereIsNoUserWithUserName: There is no user with username: {UserName}!
texts.Volo.Account:ThereIsNoUserWithId: There is no user with id:{UserId}!
texts.Volo.Account:InvalidEmailConfirmationCod: The confirmation code is invalid. Please check again.
texts.Volo.Account:EmailConfirmationCodeExpire: The confirmation code is expired. Please resend a new code and try again.
texts.Volo.Account:EmailConfirmationCodeLimitR: You have recently sent a confirmation code e-mail. You can resend the confirmation code on {0}.
texts.Volo.Account:UserDelegationIsNotAvailabl: User delegation is not available for impersonated users!
texts.Volo.Account:StartTimeMustBeLessThanEndT: Start time must be less than end time!
texts.DeleteUserDelegationConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this delegation '{0}'?
texts.AuthorityDelegation:PleaseSelectDelegati: Please select a delegation date range
texts.PasswordResetInfoInEmail: We received an account recovery request! If you initiated this request, click the following link to reset your password.
texts.SignInWithOneOfTheFollowingProviders: Sign in with one of the following providers
texts.EmailConfirmationInfoInEmail: Please confirm your email address by clicking the following link.
texts.UseAnotherServiceToLogin: Use another service to log in
texts.UserLockedOutMessage: Your account has been locked by the admin or due to invalid login attempts. Please try again later. Contact your system administrator if you think this is a mistake.
texts.LoginIsNotAllowed: You are not allowed to login! Your account is inactive or needs to confirm your email/phone number.
texts.SelfRegistrationDisabledMessage: Self user registration is disabled for this application. Contact to the application administrator to register a new user.
texts.VerifySecurityCodeNotLoggedInErrorMessag: You should be login first, in order to verify yourself! Probably, your login has been timeout. Please go to the login page and re-try it.
texts.EmailConfirmationCodeBody: Please use the code to finish your registration process. Your registration code: {0}
texts.VerifySecurityCode_Information: Please enter the verification code sent to you.
texts.SendSecurityCode_Information: You should verify yourself to login. Please select a verification type. A code will be sent based on the selected verification type.
texts.SendPasswordResetLink_Information: A password reset link will be sent to your email to reset your password. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.
texts.PasswordResetMailSentMessage: An account recovery email has been sent. If you don't see it in 15 minutes, check your junk folder and mark it as 'Not Junk'.
texts.PreventEmailEnumerationPasswordResetMail: If the provided e-mail address is registered in the system, we will send a password reset link. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please check your spam box or try again later.
texts.YourEmailAddressIsSuccessfullyConfirmed: Your email address has been successfully confirmed.
texts.MailSendingFailed: Mail sending failed, please check your email configuration and try again.
texts.Description:PreventEmailEnumeration: The 'Forgot my password' screen will not return whether the given email is registered in the system or not.
texts.PasswordChangedMessage: Your password has been changed successfully.
texts.DisplayName:Name: Name
texts.TimezoneHelpText: The default timezone will try to use the browser's or the server's timezone.
texts.PersonalSettingsChangedConfirmationModal: If you want to apply these changes, you have to login. Do you want to log out?
texts.TwoFactorEnabledInfo: Two-factor authentication will not work when you remove all two-factor providers.
texts.YouHaveToEnableAtLeastOneTwoFactorProvid: You have to enable at least one two factor provider to enable two factor!
texts.NewPasswordSameAsOld: New password must be different from the old one.
texts.DisplayName:EnableLocalLogin: Allow to register and log in with local username and password
texts.Description:EnableLocalLogin: Indicates if Server will allow to register and log in with local username and password.
texts.DisplayName:VerifyPasswordDuringExternal: Require Local Password on Social Account Linking
texts.Description:VerifyPasswordDuringExternal: Users who register via both local registration and external/social login using the same email address will be required to enter their local password on the first external/social login.
texts.DoYouWantToVerifyPhoneNumberMessage: You've changed your phone number information. Would you like to verify it now?
texts.FirstlySubmitToVerify: Firstly save your new information, then you can verify.
texts.EmailConfirmationSentMessage: A verification link has been sent to your email ({0}).
texts.ConfirmationTokenSentMessage: A verification code has been sent to your phone number.
texts.PhoneConfirmationToken: Please enter the code below to verify your phone number:
texts.PhoneConfirmationSms: Hi {0}! Here is your verification code: {1}
texts.PhoneNumberEmptyHelpText: You don't have a phone number, Verify will set it.
texts.LoggedOutText: You have been signed out and you will be redirected soon.
texts.ReturnToText: Click here to return to the application
texts.MoveCursorOnExamples: Move your cursor on images to see rounded style.
texts.ProfilePictureWillBeChanged: Your profile picture will be changed.
texts.Description:UseGravatar: Use Gravatar service for your profile picture.
texts.UseGravatarConfirm: You will be using Gravatar as your profile picture.
texts.NoProfilePictureConfirm: You will use default avatar as your profile picture.
texts.PPUploadConfirm: You will use your selected image as your profile picture.
texts.GoogleCaptchaDescription: reCAPTCHA protects your website from fraud and abuse without creating friction
texts.Description:VerificationUrl: The base URL of the Google service. Example URLs: https://www.google.com/, https://www.recaptcha.net/
texts.Description:SiteKey: It is used to invoke reCAPTCHA service on your site. Leave empty to use the default value in the website configuration code.
texts.Description:SiteSecret: It authorizes communication between your website and the reCAPTCHA server to verify the user's response. Leave empty to use the default value in website configuration code.
texts.Description:Version: reCAPTCHA v3 verifies requests with a score, reCAPTCHA v2 verifies requests with a challenge.
texts.Description:Score: It is the numeric threshold value from 0.0 to 1.0. The lower threshold values will allow spammers to pass the verification. By default, you can use a threshold of 0.5.
texts.InvalidSiteKeyOrSiteSecret: Invalid site key or site secret
texts.SetNullWillUseGlobalSettings: Leave as empty to use the defaults
texts.ExternalProviderEnabledForTenantExplanat: When you enable this feature, you can set external login settings specific to the tenant users. If no external login client information is provided while enabling the feature, the host settings will be used.
texts.ExternalProviderEnabledForHostExplanatio: When you enable this feature, the external login client information below will apply to all host users.
texts.DeleteLinkAccountConfirmationMessage: Are you sure to delete the link account '{0}'?
texts.NewLinkAccountWarning: You'll be logged out from the current account and logging in with another account. Once you do it, two accounts will be linked.
texts.TheTargetAccountIsNotLinkedToYou: The target account is not linked to you!
texts.LinkAccountWarning: Please note that you are linking to other accounts, Click here to cancel the link login!
texts.AccessDeniedMessage: You do not have access to this resource.
texts.UncheckThePermissionsYouDoNotWishToGrant: Uncheck the permissions you do not wish to grant.
texts.DeviceAuthorizationSuccessfullyInfo: You have successfully authorized the device
texts.ResetAuthenticator_Information: If you would like to change your authenticator app, you can reset it here.
texts.ResetAuthenticatorWarningMessage: Reset your authenticator key your authenticator app will not work until you reconfigure it.
texts.UseTwoFactorAuthenticatorApp_Information: Open your two factor authentication app and do one of the following actions:
texts.UseTwoFactorAuthenticatorApp_Code: Your two-factor authentication application will generate a code, enter this code in the box below and confirm.
texts.RecoveryCodes_Information: Put these codes in a safe place. If you lose your device and don't have the recovery codes you will lose access to your account.
texts.LoginWithRecoveryCode_Information: You have requested to log in with a recovery code. 'Remember me' will not be enabled for this login until you provide an authenticator app code or disable 2FA and log in again.
texts.LoginWithRecoveryCode_URL: Don't have access to your authenticator device? You can log in with a recovery code
texts.RegisterWithOneOfTheFollowingProviders: Register with one of the following providers
texts.RegisterText: By clicking Register button, you agree to our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
texts.ProtocolCallbackDescription: We're redirecting you to the app. If you don't see a dialog, please click the button below.
texts.UserLockedOut:WhatDoYouNeedToDo: What do you need to do?
texts.YourAccountWillBeUnlockedOn: Your account will be unlocked on
texts.TryAgainAfterThisTimeOrContactAdministra: You can try again after this time or contact the system administrator.
texts.ClickToLoginWithYourExternalAccount: Click to login with your external account
texts.YouHaveNoExternalLoginProviderToSignIn: You have no external login provider to sign in
texts.ExternalLoginDeleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this external login '{0}'?
texts.YourSessionIsAboutToExpire: Your session is about to expire
texts.YourSessionIsAboutToExpireInfo: For security reasons, your connection times out after you've been inactive for a while. Do you want to stay signed in?
texts.IdleSessionTimeoutInfo: Idle session timeout signs users automatically out of the web apps after a period of inactivity. If you turn this on, users may start seeing more sign-in prompts.
texts.LearnMoreAboutIdleSessionTimeout: Learn more about idle session timeout
texts.IdleTimeoutMinutes: When do you want users signed out?
texts.IdleTimeoutMinutesMustBeGreaterThanZero: Idle timeout minutes must be greater than zero
texts.SessionRevokeDescription: This page shows all the devices you've logged in on. You can force log out from any device you wish.
texts.RequireMigrateSeedTitle: Could not find the admin user
texts.RequireMigrateSeedMessage: Please ensure that the database seed is executed. See documentation for possible solutions.
texts.EmailSentTitle: Confirmation code is sent to your e-mail account.
texts.EmailSentInfo: Please check your inbox to see the confirmation code and complete the registration.
texts.EnterAValueToUpdateSecret: Enter a value to update the secret
